name: bigwatermelon
description: 被西瓜整崩溃了,改动了一下代码，点击右上角的宝箱会切换水果。破坏游戏体验，谨慎尝试。 分支「default」是未改动代码 > ![image](https://github.com/JennerTien/bigwaterlemon/blob/main/1611557925872957.gif)

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && cp -r ./res/* ./dist/ && cp -r ./src/* ./dist/ && cp ./cocos2d-js-min.js ./dist/ && cp *.html ./dist/ && cp *.js ./dist/ && cp *.css ./dist/
